blog.name: chrisevansimaginez
blog.title: Chris Evans
blog.description: I write Marvel Imagines, mostly of Chris Evans and sometimes other things.

title: Gossip Girl
body:
A/N: So since I’ve been watching gossip girl, and now that I’m done with the season I was inspired to write something. I hope you like this and I hope that I can keep up with this, because I really wanna turn this into a series. SORRY if it wasn’t that great but this is only the first chapter ;) It’ll get better I promise. 

WARNINGS: NONE

Chris Evans x Reader plus more

CHAPTER ONE: A FRESH START

Gossip girl: Hey Upper East siders, it’s me your Gossip Girl, the number one source for your hottest elites…words just in someone has come back from the dead looks like Y/N has returned to the upper east side. Could this mean a new start for y/n? or even worse.

Xoxo Gossip girl

As the train stopped you headed out, looking for the way out. You were finally home in New York City, you hadn’t been home all summer, and no one knew exactly what you did or where you were except for your mother, you wanted to live a fresh new start and the only way to do it was to leave New York. As you left the train station you took a taxi to the hotel where you lived at with your mother while they were doing renovations for your new home. When you arrived in front of the hotel you sighed deeply, it was good to be back in New York again. You walked inside of the hotel, you could see eyes on you. No one knew what had happened to you and you were sure by now you were already on this site known as Gossip Girl. The phone dinged, and you took out your phone seeing the blast and a picture of you at the train station. “Ugh, already talking about me and I haven’t been in New York for a day.” You said.   “it could be worse.” A voice said from next to you. You turned around and saw a taller man standing in front of you, gorgeous blue eyes, muscular build and beautiful dark blonde hair with a bit of scruff. You smiled “Yeah, but Gossip Girl already makes it worse for me.” The man shrugged his shoulders and extended his arm out to you. “I’m Chris by the way.” He said squeezing his lips tightly together.

You smiled at him and shook his hand “I’m Y/N, it’s nice to meet you Chris.” There was an awkward silence that fell upon the both of you. “Miss Y/L/N, your mother is arriving shortly.” You nodded and sat down waiting for your mother to arrive. Chris sat next to you, still in complete silence. “Hey Chris, so what are you waiting for?” Chris stumbled over his words before taking a deep breath “I’m actually waiting for your mom, I was told to deliver this envelope to her.” You nodded and heard your mothers voice coming through the lobby. “Oh y/n It’s so good to see you.” She said as she hugged you tightly. “Look at you, you look as elegant as ever I hope boarding school treated you well?” You smiled “Good as ever mom.” Your mom smiled, and her eyes caught Chris who was standing next to you. “And who is this?” she said looking Chris over, “I’m Chris, I’m just a messenger I was told to deliver this envelope to you.” 

He handed the envelope to your mom and she thanked him. and quickly drew her attention to you. “So sweetie, I was hoping you would join me for my opening tonight, it would be a good way for everyone to also welcome you home.” You hesitated for a moment “I-“, Your mom interrupted you before you could finish “Your friends will all be there, come on Y/N” you sighed “It’s just I already have a date….with him.” she said pointing at Chris and locking her arm around his. “He’s taking me to uhm…this concert.” Chris had been clueless and hesitated for a moment “Uh yeah, a concert…full of music and people.” He said tightening his lips together. You smiled widely at your mom as she looked at the two of you. “Fine, next party though you’re coming okay?” You nodded at your mom as she walked away and into the elevator.

Chris still had been confused, “A date?” you turned to smile at him “Yes, you and I are going on a date! What do you say?” Chris blankly stared at you “uh..y..yeah sure.” You smiled at him “Great pick me up at 7 and don’t be late.” You kissed Chris on the cheek and left to catch the elevator. You both shared a gaze with each other and you smirked as the elevator doors closed.

***

7 pm was around the corner and you were dressed and waiting for Chris to pick you up, you sat in the lobby fiddling with your fingers, Until you saw Chris walking through the front door of the building, a smile had spread across your face, he was dressed in a button down shirt and pair of black slacks with his hair slick back. “Hey.” He said as he admired every curve of yours which caused you to blush. “You ready to go?” he asked you. You nodded and locked your arm around his and the both of you headed out.

Gossip girl: SPOTTED: Miss Y/L/N walking out of the New York Palace already locking arms with a mystery boy, could this be a new romance I smell in the air?

Xoxo Gossip Girl.

You could hear the dings of phones as you passed by, you felt all eyes on you and Chris, you knew that as soon as you were seen with someone new that you were going to end up on Gossip Girl, but this was a fresh start for you, this is what you needed and maybe Chris would be the reason for your new start, after all he wasn’t aware of what you had done in your past that caused you to leave New York in the first place.

summary: You know how people who buy little dogs and they love them but also are constantly annoying because there tiny tea cup puppet is...
body: You know how people who buy little dogs and they love them but also are constantly annoying because there tiny tea cup puppet is trying to fight a angry German Sheppard and the little thing just will not learn their lesson, yeah? Well Bucky is one of the people, pre-serum Steve is the tiny dog who keeps getting beat up.

summary:
Talking
seriously, if Marvel Studios has an ounce of decency, they shall add a
dedication to the credits of Avengers 4: “In...
body:
Talking seriously, if Marvel Studios has an ounce of decency, they shall add a dedication to the credits of Avengers 4: “In loving memory of Stan Lee, Steve Ditko and Jack Kirby”.

The fact of the matter is that these three men (two of which passed away this year) were the creative pillars who turned Marvel comics into a powerhouse during the 60’s. Their impact, contributions and influence, not only to the American comic book industry, but to pop culture in general, can’t really be overstated.

The Marvel Cinematic Universe wouldn’t even exist in the first place if not for them! The least the studio can do is pay them the proper respect.

The Marvel Cinematic Universe wouldn’t even exist in the first place if not for them! The least the studio can do is pay them the proper respect.

Their impact, contributions and influence, not only to the American comic book industry, but to pop culture in general, can’t really be overstated.

The Marvel Cinematic Universe wouldn’t even exist in the first place if not for them! The least the studio can do is pay them the proper respect.

summary: I Think I'll Love You Better Now
title: I Think I'll Love You Better Now
body:
Bucky’s birthday is here and you try to celebrate!

I Think I’ll Love You Better Now

You were curled up on the couch, almost asleep.Crying was tiring. Being angry was also tiring. Oh, and you were angry.You weren’t supposed to be, by this hour you were supposed to be in bed with…

Read more…
